venue.address_1: Beacon St., and Chestnut Hill Ave
venue.name: Cassidy Playground

item.description:
Here at Boston Frisbee we strive to make our games all-inclusive and fun for everyone.  However, we have gotten a lot of requests for a skills clinic for people who want to learn more of the serious/competitive side of Ultimate.

The plan for this event is to meet up at 6pm.  Warm up for about half an hour and then run a set of drills that are meant to practice specific skills and strategies.  The participants will be able to use their new knowledge to become better-informed and safer players at Boston Frisbee and elsewhere.

Hopefully this is successful and we can start holding it as a more regular event.
item.how_to_find_us: Public transport by B, C, D lines or 86 bus
item.name: Boston Frisbee Skills Clinic @ Cassidy Playground
